title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 470.4 - Transfer to county license
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 470.4 - Transfer to county license

State Regulations
(a) A
member applying for a firearms permit pursuant to Penal Law section 400.01 must
at the time of application execute a form authorizing the transfer of any
license issued by a local licensing authority pursuant to Penal Law section
400.00, to the Superintendent of State Police. No application for a license
pursuant to Penal Law section 400.01 will be granted by the superintendent
unless all outstanding licenses issued by local authority are transferred to
the authority of the superintendent. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9
ยง
470.4

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
